msg: Node.js 18.19.1 detected (need 22 LTS). pnpm not installed (need 9.x). Milestone verification blocked: pnpm install requires pnpm. ESCALATION: Human must upgrade Node.js and install pnpm before Phase A milestone can be verified.

DB migration runner complete. 10 tests pass. 6 migrations applied to Docker Compose PG17. CRITICAL BLOCKER found: ERR-069 pgvector 2000d limit vs plan 3072d. Escalate to Coordinator.

pgvector 0.8.1 has HARD LIMIT of 2000 dimensions for ALL index types (HNSW, IVFFlat). Plan specifies 3072d (ADR-016). INCOMPATIBLE. Options: (1) Amend ADR-016 to ≤2000d, (2) Wait for pgvector 0.9+, (3) Unindexed (unacceptable), (4) Alternative DB (violates ADR-002). TEMPORARY: memories table created WITHOUT vector index. BLOCKS production. Requires human decision.
